data.title: The Fat Tomato Italian Bistro
data.text:
catering

Let us cater your next event

The Fat Tomato Italian Bistro would be honored to provide our services for your next event. Each event is bespoke to your tastes and needs, to provide the best experience possible for you and your guests.

catering

order online

pick up or delivery

Don't feel like cooking today? We got you covered - order now!

order

groups & parties

We host. You party!

Not only are we professional caterers, but we are also experienced event planners. Our all-in-one packages are designed with your budget in mind, meaning all you have to do is enjoy the event.

parties

The rich flavors of Italian cuisine

eat. drink. enjoy.

Reviews

Review by - Yelp

Lisa C:

Amazing food, a gazillion choices on the menu as well! Went here on a date night with my husband, looking forward to going again.

Review by - Yelp

Marizol P:

Wow, wow, wow.... My family and I, we were so impressed with this restaurant. The food was Amazing!!!' No plate fell short! Definitely coming back!

Review by - Yelp

Madison J:

Dined at TFT last night and was very pleased with my entire experience! I walked into a lively, full restaurant and was greeted immediately. The atmosphere is perfect for a BYOB date night or a quick stop-in for lunch.

Review by - Yelp

Dana L:

The Fat Tomato is my new favorite spot!!! Cozy restaurant with a wide variety menu filled with flavor. Option for dining in or ordering take-out. We also love the option to call ahead to book their private back room when we have a group.

Review by - Yelp

T W:

Our first time in....absolutely cozy and friendly. The food was awesome. My husband and I loved the Honey Sriracha Chicken Pizza and the pulled pork sandwich. The menu has so much to offer! It was a hard choice. We will make this place a regular stop! Can't wait to come back and try something else.
